[[inst_hl_ld_pr]]
==== HL.LD.PR

*Syntax:* hl.ld.pr [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_ld_pr.svg[HL.LD.PR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/PRE_INDEX
